## R Markdown

A tuple is a colletion of values,declared in parentheses. They are immutable meaning it's values cannot be changed as in lists.This however, applies to python in specific. In R a tuple is a package. Tuple is a package that extends the base R funtionality around checking for unique and duplicate values in vectors.
A vector simplest type of data structure in R. Simply put, a vector is a sequence of data elements of the same basic type. Members of a vector are called Components.
Example of a vector c(1,2,3)
